titles.title: Keep the Promise of Medicare Act of 2006
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to stabilize the amount of the Medicare part B premium.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/1/2006--Introduced. Keep the Promise of Medicare Act of 2006 - Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cap the Medicare part B premium for each month in 2007 at the same rate for each month in 2006, adjusted for inflation.
